creator: Nanobit.com
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever watched episodes of your favorite TV show and imagined yourself as the main character?
Tabou: Interactive Stories lets you do just that!
Make choices that matter – dress up in beautiful outfits, navigate the drama and get lovestruck.
In our sensual stories, you make your secret dreams come true!

💅Customize your avatar – you choose what you want to look like 💅

📚Read thrilling chapters from a constantly growing collection of interactive stories 📚

😈Choose between sensual stories, erotic, romance, drama, LGBT friendly stories…You name it – our chapters have it! 😈

👗Dress up – wear the outfit you like best from a wide variety of choices 👗

💕Develop relationships with other characters in our erotic stories – will you be friends, enemies or lovers? 💕

😉Make choices that will affect the ending of the story – you are the master of your destiny!😉

Become a sultry goddess and master seductress in LESSONS IN LUST!
After you lose your job, you are desperate and forced to seek help from your former classmate. He is beautiful and rich... but cold-hearted. He agrees under one condition – you must seduce and ruin his rival. In order to do that, you must transform from an innocent girl into a femme fatale, and your new employer is more than happy to teach you. In these erotic episodes full of passion, can you master the art of seduction and maybe even end up lovestruck?

In BODYGUARD, you fall for the man who was hired to save your life. The only problem is, you’re already married! You’re lovestruck with your handsome bodyguard, but does he feel the same? In exciting chapters full of drama and romance, it’s your choices that determine if your love story will get a happy ending!

In THE AUCTION, a mysterious billionaire buys your companionship for a whole week! He expects you to dress up in sexy outfits and fulfill all his wishes. Can you keep up with his demands? Will you end up lovestruck or is it all just business to you?
Your choices in the episodes of this erotic story will decide!

Flirt with celebrities, dress up in fancy outfits, become famous, and find your perfect match in episodes of MATCHMAKER!
In an unexpected turn of events, you've ended up on a famous reality show. With contestants including a bad-boy singer, a famous Hollywood actor, and your model ex, these chapters are about to get hot! Are you going to be a flirt that wraps everyone around her finger to win the show, or are you looking for true love? Are you a good girl or a scandal queen? In each episode, YOU choose what you want to do, and your choices will determine the ending of this story!

In BILLIONAIRE'S DARLING, you are just a regular girl until you meet handsome billionaire Henry Lockwood. You get an offer to be his fake girlfriend... an offer that sounds too good to be true.
Henry is a complicated man and every episode is full of secrets...
Can you find out the truth? Is he really lovestruck with you, or is it all just for show?
Make the right choices to find out!
Take part in high society, dress up in expensive outfits, experience sensual moments and uncover mysteries, all in these dramatic chapters!

In MY BAD BILLIONAIRE, you pretend to be your boss’s wife! Your relationship may be fake, but the attraction between you is real. With people trying to sabotage your love story, can you two fall in love?
Try your best in these romantic and passionate episodes!

And those are just some of our romantic and erotic stories! We are constantly working to bring you new and exciting chapters.
Whichever story you choose, hours of fun are guaranteed!

Download Tabou Stories: Love Episodes now, and start living your secret life!
descriptionShort: Nothing is taboo in this game! Read steamy chapters, indulge your secret desires

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, Players!

Our game has a new update!
We fixed a few annoying bugs and made some other game improvements which mean a smoother ride for you!
And, of course, our scheduled weekly content update is also here! We hope you’re excited to continue reading your favorite story!
Now go update and start having fun!

💋 Choose between different stories: romance, drama, LGBT friendly stories…You name it – our chapters have it!💋

👗 Dress up – wear the outfit you like best from a wide variety of choices 👗

💕 Develop relationships with other characters in our stories – will you be friends, enemies or lovers? 💕

😉 Make choices that will affect the ending of the story – you are the master of your destiny!😉

Become a lawyer superstar and be the office flirt in OFFICE AFFAIR!

Your new boss is arrogant, but incredibly handsome and charming. Can you keep things professional between you? Are you going to focus on your law career, or on your gorgeous boss? Or maybe it's your kind-hearted client who caught your eye instead? It's your choice! Fight for justice, help people, and find your happy ending!

In BODYGUARD, you fall for the man who was hired to save your life. The only problem is, you’re already married! You’re lovestruck with your handsome bodyguard, but does he feel the same? In exciting chapters full of drama and romance, it’s your choices that determine if your love story will get a happy ending!

In THE AUCTION, a mysterious billionaire buys your companionship for a whole week! He's different from any man you've ever met before, but you can't help but think that his cold exterior hides deep feelings... Can you keep up with his demands? Will you end up lovestruck or is it all just business to you?

Your choices in the episodes of this dramatic story will decide!

Hang out with celebrities, dress up in fancy outfits, become famous, and find your perfect match in episodes of MATCHMAKER!

In an unexpected turn of events, you've ended up on a famous reality show. With contestants including a bad-boy singer, a famous Hollywood actor, and your model ex, these chapters are about to get interesting! Are you going to be a flirt that wraps everyone around her finger to win the show, or are you looking for true love? Are you a good girl or a scandal queen? In each episode, YOU choose what you want to do, and your choices will determine the ending of this story!

In BILLIONAIRE'S DARLING, you are just a regular girl until you meet handsome billionaire Henry Lockwood. You get an offer to be his fake girlfriend... an offer that sounds too good to be true.

Henry is a complicated man and every episode is full of secrets...

Can you find out the truth? Is he really lovestruck with you, or is it all just for show?

Make the right choices to find out!
descriptionShort: Nothing is taboo in this game! Read exciting chapters and make fun choices!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

As every week, we have new chapters coming out so time to start reading your favorite stories!
Install and enjoy yourself!

In BODYGUARD, you fall for the man who was hired to save your life. The only problem is, you’re already married! You’re lovestruck with your handsome bodyguard, but does he feel the same? In exciting chapters full of drama and romance, it’s your choices that determine if your love story will get a happy ending!

In THE AUCTION, a mysterious billionaire buys your companionship for a whole week! He's different from any man you've ever met before, but you can't help but think that his cold exterior hides deep feelings... Can you keep up with his demands? Will you end up lovestruck or is it all just business to you?

Your choices in the episodes of this dramatic story will decide!

Hang out with celebrities, dress up in fancy outfits, become famous, and find your perfect match in episodes of MATCHMAKER!

In an unexpected turn of events, you've ended up on a famous reality show. With contestants including a bad-boy singer, a famous Hollywood actor, and your model ex, these chapters are about to get interesting! Are you going to be a flirt that wraps everyone around her finger to win the show, or are you looking for true love? Are you a good girl or a scandal queen? In each episode, YOU choose what you want to do, and your choices will determine the ending of this story!

In BILLIONAIRE'S DARLING, you are just a regular girl until you meet handsome billionaire Henry Lockwood. You get an offer to be his fake girlfriend... an offer that sounds too good to be true.

Henry is a complicated man and every episode is full of secrets...

Can you find out the truth? Is he really lovestruck with you, or is it all just for show?

Make the right choices to find out!
descriptionShort: Nothing is taboo in this game! Read exciting chapters and make fun choices!

He's different from any man you've ever met before, but you can't help but think that his cold exterior hides deep feelings... Can you keep up with his demands? Will you end up lovestruck or is it all just business to you?

Your choices in the episodes of this dramatic story will decide!

Hang out with celebrities, dress up in fancy outfits, become famous, and find your perfect match in episodes of MATCHMAKER!

In an unexpected turn of events, you've ended up on a famous reality show. With contestants including a bad-boy singer, a famous Hollywood actor, and your model ex, these chapters are about to get interesting! Are you going to be a flirt that wraps everyone around her finger to win the show, or are you looking for true love? Are you a good girl or a scandal queen? In each episode, YOU choose what you want to do, and your choices will determine the ending of this story!

In BILLIONAIRE'S DARLING, you are just a regular girl until you meet handsome billionaire Henry Lockwood. You get an offer to be his fake girlfriend... an offer that sounds too good to be true.

Henry is a complicated man and every episode is full of secrets...

Can you find out the truth? Is he really lovestruck with you, or is it all just for show?

Make the right choices to find out!
descriptionShort: Nothing is taboo in this game! Read exciting chapters and make fun choices!

In BILLIONAIRE'S DARLING, you are just a regular girl until you meet handsome billionaire Henry Lockwood. You get an offer to be his fake girlfriend... an offer that sounds too good to be true.

Henry is a complicated man and every episode is full of secrets...

Can you find out the truth? Is he really lovestruck with you, or is it all just for show?

Make the right choices to find out!

Have you ever watched episodes of your favorite TV show and imagined yourself as the main character?

Tabou Stories: Love Episodes lets you do just that!

Make choices that matter – dress up in beautiful outfits, navigate the drama and get lovestruck.

In our thrilling stories, you make your secret dreams come true!

💅 Customize your avatar – you choose what you want to look like 💅

📚 Read thrilling chapters from a constantly growing collection of interactive stories 📚

💋 Choose between different stories: romance, drama, LGBT friendly stories…You name it – our chapters have it!💋

👗 Dress up – wear the outfit you like best from a wide variety of choices 👗

💕 Develop relationships with other characters in our stories – will you be friends, enemies or lovers? 💕

😉 Make choices that will affect the ending of the story – you are the master of your destiny!😉

Become a lawyer superstar and be the office flirt in OFFICE AFFAIR!

Your new boss is arrogant, but incredibly handsome and charming. Can you keep things professional between you? Are you going to focus on your law career, or on your gorgeous boss? Or maybe it's your kind-hearted client who caught your eye instead? It's your choice! Fight for justice, help people, and find your happy ending!

In BODYGUARD, you fall for the man who was hired to save your life. The only problem is, you’re already married! You’re lovestruck with your handsome bodyguard, but does he feel the same? In exciting chapters full of drama and romance, it’s your choices that determine if your love story will get a happy ending!

In THE AUCTION, a mysterious billionaire buys your companionship for a whole week! He's different from any man you've ever met before, but you can't help but think that his cold exterior hides deep feelings... Can you keep up with his demands? Will you end up lovestruck or is it all just business to you?

Your choices in the episodes of this dramatic story will decide!

Hang out with celebrities, dress up in fancy outfits, become famous, and find your perfect match in episodes of MATCHMAKER!

In an unexpected turn of events, you've ended up on a famous reality show. With contestants including a bad-boy singer, a famous Hollywood actor, and your model ex, these chapters are about to get interesting! Are you going to be a flirt that wraps everyone around her finger to win the show, or are you looking for true love? Are you a good girl or a scandal queen? In each episode, YOU choose what you want to do, and your choices will determine the ending of this story!

In BILLIONAIRE'S DARLING, you are just a regular girl until you meet handsome billionaire Henry Lockwood. You get an offer to be his fake girlfriend... an offer that sounds too good to be true.

Henry is a complicated man and every episode is full of secrets...

Can you find out the truth? Is he really lovestruck with you, or is it all just for show?

Make the right choices to find out!
descriptionShort: Choose your own story full of drama, romance, and passion!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, Players!

New update is here. We’re very excited about the improvements we made to the game, hope you’ll be, too!
Needless to say, some bugs were squashed so you could have a better gaming experience.
As every week, we have new chapters coming out so time to start reading your favorite stories!
Install and enjoy yourself!

In BODYGUARD, you fall for the man who was hired to save your life. The only problem is, you’re already married! You’re lovestruck with your handsome bodyguard, but does he feel the same? In exciting chapters full of drama and romance, it’s your choices that determine if your love story will get a happy ending!

In THE AUCTION, a mysterious billionaire buys your companionship for a whole week! He's different from any man you've ever met before, but you can't help but think that his cold exterior hides deep feelings... Can you keep up with his demands? Will you end up lovestruck or is it all just business to you?

Your choices in the episodes of this dramatic story will decide!

Hang out with celebrities, dress up in fancy outfits, become famous, and find your perfect match in episodes of MATCHMAKER!

In an unexpected turn of events, you've ended up on a famous reality show. With contestants including a bad-boy singer, a famous Hollywood actor, and your model ex, these chapters are about to get interesting! Are you going to be a flirt that wraps everyone around her finger to win the show, or are you looking for true love? Are you a good girl or a scandal queen? In each episode, YOU choose what you want to do, and your choices will determine the ending of this story!

In BILLIONAIRE'S DARLING, you are just a regular girl until you meet handsome billionaire Henry Lockwood. You get an offer to be his fake girlfriend... an offer that sounds too good to be true.

Henry is a complicated man and every episode is full of secrets...

Can you find out the truth? Is he really lovestruck with you, or is it all just for show?

Make the right choices to find out!
descriptionShort: Choose your own story full of drama, romance, and passion!

Are you going to be a flirt that wraps everyone around her finger to win the show, or are you looking for true love? Are you a good girl or a scandal queen? In each episode, YOU choose what you want to do, and your choices will determine the ending of this story!

In BILLIONAIRE'S DARLING, you are just a regular girl until you meet handsome billionaire Henry Lockwood. You get an offer to be his fake girlfriend... an offer that sounds too good to be true.

Henry is a complicated man and every episode is full of secrets...

Can you find out the truth? Is he really lovestruck with you, or is it all just for show?

Make the right choices to find out!

In BILLIONAIRE'S DARLING, you are just a regular girl until you meet handsome billionaire Henry Lockwood. You get an offer to be his fake girlfriend... an offer that sounds too good to be true.

Henry is a complicated man and every episode is full of secrets...

Can you find out the truth? Is he really lovestruck with you, or is it all just for show?

Make the right choices to find out!

Have you ever watched episodes of your favorite TV show and imagined yourself as the main character?

Tabou Stories: Love Episodes lets you do just that!

Make choices that matter – dress up in beautiful outfits, navigate the drama and get lovestruck.

In our thrilling stories, you make your secret dreams come true!

💅 Customize your avatar – you choose what you want to look like 💅

📚 Read thrilling chapters from a constantly growing collection of interactive stories 📚

💋 Choose between different stories: romance, drama, LGBT friendly stories…You name it – our chapters have it!💋

👗 Dress up – wear the outfit you like best from a wide variety of choices 👗

💕 Develop relationships with other characters in our stories – will you be friends, enemies or lovers? 💕

😉 Make choices that will affect the ending of the story – you are the master of your destiny!😉

Become a lawyer superstar and be the office flirt in OFFICE AFFAIR!

Your new boss is arrogant, but incredibly handsome and charming. Can you keep things professional between you? Are you going to focus on your law career, or on your gorgeous boss? Or maybe it's your kind-hearted client who caught your eye instead? It's your choice! Fight for justice, help people, and find your happy ending!

In BODYGUARD, you fall for the man who was hired to save your life. The only problem is, you’re already married! You’re lovestruck with your handsome bodyguard, but does he feel the same? In exciting chapters full of drama and romance, it’s your choices that determine if your love story will get a happy ending!

In THE AUCTION, a mysterious billionaire buys your companionship for a whole week! He's different from any man you've ever met before, but you can't help but think that his cold exterior hides deep feelings... Can you keep up with his demands? Will you end up lovestruck or is it all just business to you?

Your choices in the episodes of this dramatic story will decide!

Hang out with celebrities, dress up in fancy outfits, become famous, and find your perfect match in episodes of MATCHMAKER!

In an unexpected turn of events, you've ended up on a famous reality show. With contestants including a bad-boy singer, a famous Hollywood actor, and your model ex, these chapters are about to get interesting! Are you going to be a flirt that wraps everyone around her finger to win the show, or are you looking for true love? Are you a good girl or a scandal queen? In each episode, YOU choose what you want to do, and your choices will determine the ending of this story!

In BILLIONAIRE'S DARLING, you are just a regular girl until you meet handsome billionaire Henry Lockwood. You get an offer to be his fake girlfriend... an offer that sounds too good to be true.

Henry is a complicated man and every episode is full of secrets...

Can you find out the truth? Is he really lovestruck with you, or is it all just for show?

Make the right choices to find out!
descriptionShort: Make your taboo dreams come true! Read riveting stories and make fun choices!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, Players!

New update is here. We’re very excited about the improvements we made to the game, hope you’ll be, too!
Needless to say, some bugs were squashed so you could have a better gaming experience.
As every week, we have new chapters coming out so time to start reading your favorite stories!
Install and enjoy yourself!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, Players!

New update is here. We’re very excited about the improvements we made to the game, hope you’ll be, too!
Needless to say, some bugs were squashed so you could have a better gaming experience.
But that’s not all - we also added Limited Special stories to our collection! You will get a new exciting story every day, so hurry up and unleash your passion!
As every week, we have new chapters coming out so time to start reading your favorite stories!
Install and enjoy yourself!

Make choices that matter – dress up in beautiful outfits, navigate the drama and get lovestruck.

In our thrilling stories, you make your secret dreams come true!

💅 Customize your avatar – you choose what you want to look like 💅

📚 Read thrilling chapters from a constantly growing collection of interactive stories 📚

💋 Choose between different stories: romance, drama, LGBT friendly stories…You name it – our chapters have it!💋

👗 Dress up – wear the outfit you like best from a wide variety of choices 👗

💕 Develop relationships with other characters in our stories – will you be friends, enemies or lovers? 💕

😉 Make choices that will affect the ending of the story – you are the master of your destiny!😉

Become a lawyer superstar and be the office flirt in OFFICE AFFAIR!

Your new boss is arrogant, but incredibly handsome and charming. Can you keep things professional between you? Are you going to focus on your law career, or on your gorgeous boss? Or maybe it's your kind-hearted client who caught your eye instead? It's your choice! Fight for justice, help people, and find your happy ending!

In BODYGUARD, you fall for the man who was hired to save your life. The only problem is, you’re already married! You’re lovestruck with your handsome bodyguard, but does he feel the same? In exciting chapters full of drama and romance, it’s your choices that determine if your love story will get a happy ending!

In THE AUCTION, a mysterious billionaire buys your companionship for a whole week! He's different from any man you've ever met before, but you can't help but think that his cold exterior hides deep feelings... Can you keep up with his demands? Will you end up lovestruck or is it all just business to you?

Your choices in the episodes of this dramatic story will decide!

Hang out with celebrities, dress up in fancy outfits, become famous, and find your perfect match in episodes of MATCHMAKER!

In an unexpected turn of events, you've ended up on a famous reality show. With contestants including a bad-boy singer, a famous Hollywood actor, and your model ex, these chapters are about to get interesting! Are you going to be a flirt that wraps everyone around her finger to win the show, or are you looking for true love? Are you a good girl or a scandal queen? In each episode, YOU choose what you want to do, and your choices will determine the ending of this story!

In BILLIONAIRE'S DARLING, you are just a regular girl until you meet handsome billionaire Henry Lockwood. You get an offer to be his fake girlfriend... an offer that sounds too good to be true.

Henry is a complicated man and every episode is full of secrets...

Can you find out the truth? Is he really lovestruck with you, or is it all just for show?

Make the right choices to find out!

FOLLOW US:
Instagram: @tabou_game
Facebook: facebook.com/taboustories
descriptionShort: Live out all your taboo fantasies! Make exciting choices and impact the story!

title: Tabou Stories®: Love Episodes

creator: NANOBIT
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever watched episodes of your favorite TV show and imagined yourself as the main character?

Tabou Stories: Love Episodes lets you do just that!

Make choices that matter – dress up in beautiful outfits, navigate the drama and get lovestruck.

In our thrilling stories, you make your secret dreams come true!

💅 Customize your avatar – you choose what you want to look like 💅

📚 Read thrilling chapters from a constantly growing collection of interactive stories 📚

💋 Choose between different stories: romance, drama, LGBT friendly stories…You name it – our chapters have it!💋

👗 Dress up – wear the outfit you like best from a wide variety of choices 👗

💕 Develop relationships with other characters in our stories – will you be friends, enemies or lovers? 💕

😉 Make choices that will affect the ending of the story – you are the master of your destiny!😉

Become a lawyer superstar and be the office flirt in OFFICE AFFAIR!

Your new boss is arrogant, but incredibly handsome and charming. Can you keep things professional between you? Are you going to focus on your law career, or on your gorgeous boss? Or maybe it's your kind-hearted client who caught your eye instead? It's your choice! Fight for justice, help people, and find your happy ending!

In BODYGUARD, you fall for the man who was hired to save your life. The only problem is, you’re already married! You’re lovestruck with your handsome bodyguard, but does he feel the same? In exciting chapters full of drama and romance, it’s your choices that determine if your love story will get a happy ending!

In THE AUCTION, a mysterious billionaire buys your companionship for a whole week! He's different from any man you've ever met before, but you can't help but think that his cold exterior hides deep feelings... Can you keep up with his demands? Will you end up lovestruck or is it all just business to you?

Your choices in the episodes of this dramatic story will decide!

Hang out with celebrities, dress up in fancy outfits, become famous, and find your perfect match in episodes of MATCHMAKER!

In an unexpected turn of events, you've ended up on a famous reality show. With contestants including a bad-boy singer, a famous Hollywood actor, and your model ex, these chapters are about to get interesting! Are you going to be a flirt that wraps everyone around her finger to win the show, or are you looking for true love? Are you a good girl or a scandal queen? In each episode, YOU choose what you want to do, and your choices will determine the ending of this story!

In BILLIONAIRE'S DARLING, you are just a regular girl until you meet handsome billionaire Henry Lockwood. You get an offer to be his fake girlfriend... an offer that sounds too good to be true.

Henry is a complicated man and every episode is full of secrets...

Can you find out the truth? Is he really lovestruck with you, or is it all just for show?

Make the right choices to find out!

FOLLOW US:
Instagram: @tabou_game
Facebook: facebook.com/taboustories
descriptionShort: Make your taboo dreams come true! Read riveting stories and make fun choices!

Have you ever watched episodes of your favorite TV show and imagined yourself as the main character?

Tabou Stories: Love Episodes lets you do just that!

Make choices that matter – dress up in beautiful outfits, navigate the drama and get lovestruck.

In our thrilling stories, you make your secret dreams come true!

💅 Customize your avatar – you choose what you want to look like 💅

📚 Read thrilling chapters from a constantly growing collection of interactive stories 📚

💋 Choose between different stories: romance, drama, LGBT friendly stories…You name it – our chapters have it!💋

👗 Dress up – wear the outfit you like best from a wide variety of choices 👗

💕 Develop relationships with other characters in our stories – will you be friends, enemies or lovers? 💕

😉 Make choices that will affect the ending of the story – you are the master of your destiny!😉

Become a lawyer superstar and be the office flirt in OFFICE AFFAIR!

Your new boss is arrogant, but incredibly handsome and charming. Can you keep things professional between you? Are you going to focus on your law career, or on your gorgeous boss? Or maybe it's your kind-hearted client who caught your eye instead? It's your choice! Fight for justice, help people, and find your happy ending!

In BODYGUARD, you fall for the man who was hired to save your life. The only problem is, you’re already married! You’re lovestruck with your handsome bodyguard, but does he feel the same? In exciting chapters full of drama and romance, it’s your choices that determine if your love story will get a happy ending!

In THE AUCTION, a mysterious billionaire buys your companionship for a whole week! He's different from any man you've ever met before, but you can't help but think that his cold exterior hides deep feelings... Can you keep up with his demands? Will you end up lovestruck or is it all just business to you?

Your choices in the episodes of this dramatic story will decide!

Hang out with celebrities, dress up in fancy outfits, become famous, and find your perfect match in episodes of MATCHMAKER!

In an unexpected turn of events, you've ended up on a famous reality show. With contestants including a bad-boy singer, a famous Hollywood actor, and your model ex, these chapters are about to get interesting! Are you going to be a flirt that wraps everyone around her finger to win the show, or are you looking for true love? Are you a good girl or a scandal queen? In each episode, YOU choose what you want to do, and your choices will determine the ending of this story!

In BILLIONAIRE'S DARLING, you are just a regular girl until you meet handsome billionaire Henry Lockwood. You get an offer to be his fake girlfriend... an offer that sounds too good to be true.

Henry is a complicated man and every episode is full of secrets...

Can you find out the truth? Is he really lovestruck with you, or is it all just for show?

Make the right choices to find out!

FOLLOW US:
Instagram: @tabou_game
Facebook: facebook.com/taboustories
descriptionShort: Live out all your taboo fantasies! Make exciting choices and impact the story!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, Players!

New update is here. We’re very excited about the improvements we made to the game, hope you’ll be, too!
Needless to say, some bugs were squashed so you could have a better gaming experience.
As every week, we have new chapters coming out so time to start reading your favorite stories!
Install and enjoy yourself!

In our thrilling stories, you make your secret dreams come true!

💅 Customize your avatar – you choose what you want to look like 💅

📚 Read thrilling chapters from a constantly growing collection of interactive stories 📚

💋 Choose between different stories: romance, drama, LGBT friendly stories…You name it – our chapters have it!💋

👗 Dress up – wear the outfit you like best from a wide variety of choices 👗

💕 Develop relationships with other characters in our stories – will you be friends, enemies or lovers? 💕

😉 Make choices that will affect the ending of the story – you are the master of your destiny!😉

Become a lawyer superstar and be the office flirt in OFFICE AFFAIR!

Your new boss is arrogant, but incredibly handsome and charming. Can you keep things professional between you? Are you going to focus on your law career, or on your gorgeous boss? Or maybe it's your kind-hearted client who caught your eye instead? It's your choice! Fight for justice, help people, and find your happy ending!

In BODYGUARD, you fall for the man who was hired to save your life. The only problem is, you’re already married! You’re lovestruck with your handsome bodyguard, but does he feel the same? In exciting chapters full of drama and romance, it’s your choices that determine if your love story will get a happy ending!

In THE AUCTION, a mysterious billionaire buys your companionship for a whole week! He's different from any man you've ever met before, but you can't help but think that his cold exterior hides deep feelings... Can you keep up with his demands? Will you end up lovestruck or is it all just business to you?

Your choices in the episodes of this dramatic story will decide!

Hang out with celebrities, dress up in fancy outfits, become famous, and find your perfect match in episodes of MATCHMAKER!

In an unexpected turn of events, you've ended up on a famous reality show. With contestants including a bad-boy singer, a famous Hollywood actor, and your model ex, these chapters are about to get interesting! Are you going to be a flirt that wraps everyone around her finger to win the show, or are you looking for true love? Are you a good girl or a scandal queen? In each episode, YOU choose what you want to do, and your choices will determine the ending of this story!

In BILLIONAIRE'S DARLING, you are just a regular girl until you meet handsome billionaire Henry Lockwood. You get an offer to be his fake girlfriend... an offer that sounds too good to be true.

Henry is a complicated man and every episode is full of secrets...

Can you find out the truth? Is he really lovestruck with you, or is it all just for show?

Make the right choices to find out!

FOLLOW US:
Instagram: @tabou_game
Facebook: facebook.com/taboustories

title: Tabou Stories®: Love Episodes

creator: NANOBIT
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever watched episodes of your favorite TV show and imagined yourself as the main character?

Tabou Stories: Love Episodes lets you do just that!

Make choices that matter – dress up in beautiful outfits, navigate the drama and get lovestruck.

In our thrilling stories, you make your secret dreams come true!

💅 Customize your avatar – you choose what you want to look like 💅

📚 Read thrilling chapters from a constantly growing collection of interactive stories 📚

💋 Choose between different stories: romance, drama, LGBT friendly stories…You name it – our chapters have it!💋

👗 Dress up – wear the outfit you like best from a wide variety of choices 👗

💕 Develop relationships with other characters in our stories – will you be friends, enemies or lovers? 💕

😉 Make choices that will affect the ending of the story – you are the master of your destiny!😉

Become a lawyer superstar and be the office flirt in OFFICE AFFAIR!

Your new boss is arrogant, but incredibly handsome and charming. Can you keep things professional between you? Are you going to focus on your law career, or on your gorgeous boss? Or maybe it's your kind-hearted client who caught your eye instead? It's your choice! Fight for justice, help people, and find your happy ending!

In BODYGUARD, you fall for the man who was hired to save your life. The only problem is, you’re already married! You’re lovestruck with your handsome bodyguard, but does he feel the same? In exciting chapters full of drama and romance, it’s your choices that determine if your love story will get a happy ending!

In THE AUCTION, a mysterious billionaire buys your companionship for a whole week! He's different from any man you've ever met before, but you can't help but think that his cold exterior hides deep feelings... Can you keep up with his demands? Will you end up lovestruck or is it all just business to you?

Your choices in the episodes of this dramatic story will decide!

Hang out with celebrities, dress up in fancy outfits, become famous, and find your perfect match in episodes of MATCHMAKER!

In an unexpected turn of events, you've ended up on a famous reality show. With contestants including a bad-boy singer, a famous Hollywood actor, and your model ex, these chapters are about to get interesting! Are you going to be a flirt that wraps everyone around her finger to win the show, or are you looking for true love? Are you a good girl or a scandal queen? In each episode, YOU choose what you want to do, and your choices will determine the ending of this story!

In BILLIONAIRE'S DARLING, you are just a regular girl until you meet handsome billionaire Henry Lockwood. You get an offer to be his fake girlfriend... an offer that sounds too good to be true.

Henry is a complicated man and every episode is full of secrets...

Can you find out the truth? Is he really lovestruck with you, or is it all just for show?

Make the right choices to find out!

FOLLOW US:
Instagram: @tabou_game
Facebook: facebook.com/taboustories
descriptionShort: Live out all your taboo fantasies! Make exciting choices and impact the story!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, Players!

New update is here. We’re very excited about the improvements we made to the game, hope you’ll be, too!
Needless to say, some bugs were squashed so you could have a better gaming experience.
As every week, we have new chapters coming out so time to start reading your favorite stories!
Install and enjoy yourself!

creator: NANOBIT
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever watched episodes of your favorite TV show and imagined yourself as the main character?

Tabou Stories: Love Episodes lets you do just that!

Make choices that matter – dress up in beautiful outfits, navigate the drama and get lovestruck.

In our thrilling stories, you make your secret dreams come true!

💅 Customize your avatar – you choose what you want to look like 💅

📚 Read thrilling chapters from a constantly growing collection of interactive stories 📚

💋 Choose between different stories: romance, drama, LGBT friendly stories…You name it – our chapters have it!💋

👗 Dress up – wear the outfit you like best from a wide variety of choices 👗

💕 Develop relationships with other characters in our stories – will you be friends, enemies or lovers? 💕

😉 Make choices that will affect the ending of the story – you are the master of your destiny!😉

Become a lawyer superstar and be the office flirt in OFFICE AFFAIR!

Your new boss is arrogant, but incredibly handsome and charming. Can you keep things professional between you? Are you going to focus on your law career, or on your gorgeous boss? Or maybe it's your kind-hearted client who caught your eye instead? It's your choice! Fight for justice, help people, and find your happy ending!

In BODYGUARD, you fall for the man who was hired to save your life. The only problem is, you’re already married! You’re lovestruck with your handsome bodyguard, but does he feel the same? In exciting chapters full of drama and romance, it’s your choices that determine if your love story will get a happy ending!

In THE AUCTION, a mysterious billionaire buys your companionship for a whole week! He's different from any man you've ever met before, but you can't help but think that his cold exterior hides deep feelings... Can you keep up with his demands? Will you end up lovestruck or is it all just business to you?

Your choices in the episodes of this dramatic story will decide!

Hang out with celebrities, dress up in fancy outfits, become famous, and find your perfect match in episodes of MATCHMAKER!

In an unexpected turn of events, you've ended up on a famous reality show. With contestants including a bad-boy singer, a famous Hollywood actor, and your model ex, these chapters are about to get interesting! Are you going to be a flirt that wraps everyone around her finger to win the show, or are you looking for true love? Are you a good girl or a scandal queen? In each episode, YOU choose what you want to do, and your choices will determine the ending of this story!

In BILLIONAIRE'S DARLING, you are just a regular girl until you meet handsome billionaire Henry Lockwood. You get an offer to be his fake girlfriend... an offer that sounds too good to be true.

Henry is a complicated man and every episode is full of secrets...

Can you find out the truth? Is he really lovestruck with you, or is it all just for show?

Make the right choices to find out!

FOLLOW US:
Instagram: @tabou_game
Facebook: facebook.com/taboustories
descriptionShort: Make your taboo dreams come true! Read riveting stories and make fun choices!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, Players!

New update is here. We’re very excited about the improvements we made to the game, hope you’ll be, too!
Needless to say, some bugs were squashed so you could have a better gaming experience.
As every week, we have new chapters coming out so time to start reading your favorite stories!
Install and enjoy yourself!

2.22

creator: NANOBIT
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever watched episodes of your favorite TV show and imagined yourself as the main character?

Tabou Stories: Love Episodes lets you do just that!

Make choices that matter – dress up in beautiful outfits, navigate the drama and get lovestruck.

In our thrilling stories, you make your secret dreams come true!

💅 Customize your avatar – you choose what you want to look like 💅

📚 Read thrilling chapters from a constantly growing collection of interactive stories 📚

💋 Choose between different stories: romance, drama, LGBT friendly stories…You name it – our chapters have it!💋

👗 Dress up – wear the outfit you like best from a wide variety of choices 👗

💕 Develop relationships with other characters in our stories – will you be friends, enemies or lovers? 💕

😉 Make choices that will affect the ending of the story – you are the master of your destiny!😉

Become a lawyer superstar and be the office flirt in OFFICE AFFAIR!

Your new boss is arrogant, but incredibly handsome and charming. Can you keep things professional between you? Are you going to focus on your law career, or on your gorgeous boss? Or maybe it's your kind-hearted client who caught your eye instead? It's your choice! Fight for justice, help people, and find your happy ending!

In BODYGUARD, you fall for the man who was hired to save your life. The only problem is, you’re already married! You’re lovestruck with your handsome bodyguard, but does he feel the same? In exciting chapters full of drama and romance, it’s your choices that determine if your love story will get a happy ending!

In THE AUCTION, a mysterious billionaire buys your companionship for a whole week! He's different from any man you've ever met before, but you can't help but think that his cold exterior hides deep feelings... Can you keep up with his demands? Will you end up lovestruck or is it all just business to you?

Your choices in the episodes of this dramatic story will decide!

Hang out with celebrities, dress up in fancy outfits, become famous, and find your perfect match in episodes of MATCHMAKER!

In an unexpected turn of events, you've ended up on a famous reality show. With contestants including a bad-boy singer, a famous Hollywood actor, and your model ex, these chapters are about to get interesting! Are you going to be a flirt that wraps everyone around her finger to win the show, or are you looking for true love? Are you a good girl or a scandal queen? In each episode, YOU choose what you want to do, and your choices will determine the ending of this story!

In BILLIONAIRE'S DARLING, you are just a regular girl until you meet handsome billionaire Henry Lockwood. You get an offer to be his fake girlfriend... an offer that sounds too good to be true.

Henry is a complicated man and every episode is full of secrets...

Can you find out the truth? Is he really lovestruck with you, or is it all just for show?

Make the right choices to find out!

FOLLOW US:
Instagram: @tabou_game
Facebook: facebook.com/taboustories
descriptionShort: Live out all your taboo fantasies! Make exciting choices and impact the story!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hi, Players!

New update is here. We’re very excited about the improvements we made to the game, hope you’ll be, too!
Needless to say, some bugs were squashed so you could have a better gaming experience.
As every week, we have new chapters coming out so time to start reading your favorite stories!
Install and enjoy yourself!

title:
Tabou Stories®: Love Episodes
2.23.2

creator: NANOBIT
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Tabou Stories: Love Episodes, where your choices shape your destiny in thrilling adventures!

Immerse yourself in the ultimate interactive experience, where each decision you make crafts a captivating narrative. Are you prepared to embark on a journey where the power to choose is firmly in your hands?

📖 Step into a realm of infinite possibilities with our diverse collection of chapters. Whether you yearn for heart-pounding romance, gripping drama, or spine-tingling suspense, our stories have something to captivate every heart!

💕 Forge meaningful connections with intriguing characters as you navigate through our immersive episodes. Will you assume the role of the hero, the villain, or the lovestruck protagonist? The choice is entirely yours!

👗 Express your individual style by dressing your avatar in an array of fashionable outfits. Whether you lean towards timeless elegance or daring boldness, there's an ensemble for every occasion.

🔥 Feel the flames of passion as you immerse yourself in steamy romances and spicy encounters. From tender kisses to exhilarating whispers, each moment ignites the senses!

🌟 Craft your own narrative and chart a course towards true romance. With every decision you make, you sculpt the fate of your character, leading to multiple endings and boundless possibilities.

💖 Make choices that truly resonate and let your heart lead you through a whirlwind of emotions. Will you discover true love, or will you succumb to the allure of forbidden romance?

Find a way to your boss's heart and be the office flirt in HOW TO RUIN YOUR BOSS!

Your boss, who you've had a crush on for the longest time, is incredibly handsome and charming. Can you keep things professional between you? Are you going to focus on your career, or on your gorgeous boss? Fight a way to make things work and find your happy ending!

 In BODYGUARD, you fall for the man who was hired to save your life. You’re lovestruck – but does he feel the same? In exciting chapters full of drama and romance, it’s your choices that determine if your love story will get a happy ending!

In THE PROPOSAL, a mysterious billionaire gets to accompany you for a whole week! He's different from any man you've ever met before, but you can't help but think that his cold exterior hides deep feelings... Can you keep up with his demands? Will you end up lovestruck or is it all just business to you?

Hang out with celebrities, dress up in fancy outfits, become famous, and find your perfect match in episodes of MATCHMAKER!

In an unexpected turn of events, you've ended up on a famous reality show. With contestants including a bad-boy singer, a famous Hollywood actor, and your model ex, these chapters are about to get interesting! Are you going to be a flirt that wraps everyone around her finger to win the show, or are you looking for true love? Are you a good girl or a scandal queen? In each episode, YOU choose what you want to do, and your choices will determine the ending of this story!

In VAMPIRE’S KISS you finally got accustomed to the twenty-first-century lifestyle. Everything changes when you get an invitation to the vampire ball where you’ll meet someone you lost a century ago…

In MY BAD BILLIONAIRE, you pretend to be your boss’s wife! Your relationship may be fake, but the chemistry between you is real. With people trying to sabotage your love story, can you two fall in love?

And that's just the beginning! We're continuously creating new and exciting chapters for you to enjoy.

No matter which story you choose, hours of entertainment await!

Download Tabou Stories: Love Episodes now and begin living your secret life!

FOLLOW US:
Instagram: @tabou_game
Facebook: facebook.com/taboustories
descriptionShort: Live out all your taboo fantasies! Make exciting choices and impact the story!

🌟 Craft your own narrative and chart a course towards true romance. With every decision you make, you sculpt the fate of your character, leading to multiple endings and boundless possibilities.

💖 Make choices that truly resonate and let your heart lead you through a whirlwind of emotions. Will you discover true love, or will you succumb to the allure of forbidden romance?

Find a way to your boss's heart and be the office flirt in HOW TO RUIN YOUR BOSS!

Your boss, who you've had a crush on for the longest time, is incredibly handsome and charming. Can you keep things professional between you? Are you going to focus on your career, or on your gorgeous boss? Fight a way to make things work and find your happy ending!

 In BODYGUARD, you fall for the man who was hired to save your life. You’re lovestruck – but does he feel the same? In exciting chapters full of drama and romance, it’s your choices that determine if your love story will get a happy ending!

In THE PROPOSAL, a mysterious billionaire gets to accompany you for a whole week! He's different from any man you've ever met before, but you can't help but think that his cold exterior hides deep feelings... Can you keep up with his demands? Will you end up lovestruck or is it all just business to you?

Hang out with celebrities, dress up in fancy outfits, become famous, and find your perfect match in episodes of MATCHMAKER!

In an unexpected turn of events, you've ended up on a famous reality show. With contestants including a bad-boy singer, a famous Hollywood actor, and your model ex, these chapters are about to get interesting! Are you going to be a flirt that wraps everyone around her finger to win the show, or are you looking for true love? Are you a good girl or a scandal queen? In each episode, YOU choose what you want to do, and your choices will determine the ending of this story!

In VAMPIRE’S KISS you finally got accustomed to the twenty-first-century lifestyle. Everything changes when you get an invitation to the vampire ball where you’ll meet someone you lost a century ago…

In MY BAD BILLIONAIRE, you pretend to be your boss’s wife! Your relationship may be fake, but the chemistry between you is real. With people trying to sabotage your love story, can you two fall in love?

And that's just the beginning! We're continuously creating new and exciting chapters for you to enjoy.

No matter which story you choose, hours of entertainment await!

Download Tabou Stories: Love Episodes now and begin living your secret life!

📖 Step into a realm of infinite possibilities with our diverse collection of chapters. Whether you yearn for heart-pounding romance, gripping drama, or spine-tingling suspense, our stories have something to captivate every heart!

💕 Forge meaningful connections with intriguing characters as you navigate through our immersive episodes. Will you assume the role of the hero, the villain, or the lovestruck protagonist? The choice is entirely yours!

👗 Express your individual style by dressing your avatar in an array of fashionable outfits. Whether you lean towards timeless elegance or daring boldness, there's an ensemble for every occasion.

🔥 Feel the flames of passion as you immerse yourself in steamy romances and spicy encounters. From tender kisses to exhilarating whispers, each moment ignites the senses!

🌟 Craft your own narrative and chart a course towards true romance. With every decision you make, you sculpt the fate of your character, leading to multiple endings and boundless possibilities.

💖 Make choices that truly resonate and let your heart lead you through a whirlwind of emotions. Will you discover true love, or will you succumb to the allure of forbidden romance?

Find a way to your boss's heart and be the office flirt in HOW TO RUIN YOUR BOSS!

Your boss, who you've had a crush on for the longest time, is incredibly handsome and charming. Can you keep things professional between you? Are you going to focus on your career, or on your gorgeous boss? Fight a way to make things work and find your happy ending!

 In BODYGUARD, you fall for the man who was hired to save your life. You’re lovestruck – but does he feel the same? In exciting chapters full of drama and romance, it’s your choices that determine if your love story will get a happy ending!

In THE PROPOSAL, a mysterious billionaire gets to accompany you for a whole week! He's different from any man you've ever met before, but you can't help but think that his cold exterior hides deep feelings... Can you keep up with his demands? Will you end up lovestruck or is it all just business to you?

Hang out with celebrities, dress up in fancy outfits, become famous, and find your perfect match in episodes of MATCHMAKER!

In an unexpected turn of events, you've ended up on a famous reality show. With contestants including a bad-boy singer, a famous Hollywood actor, and your model ex, these chapters are about to get interesting! Are you going to be a flirt that wraps everyone around her finger to win the show, or are you looking for true love? Are you a good girl or a scandal queen? In each episode, YOU choose what you want to do, and your choices will determine the ending of this story!

In VAMPIRE’S KISS you finally got accustomed to the twenty-first-century lifestyle. Everything changes when you get an invitation to the vampire ball where you’ll meet someone you lost a century ago…

In MY BAD BILLIONAIRE, you pretend to be your boss’s wife! Your relationship may be fake, but the chemistry between you is real. With people trying to sabotage your love story, can you two fall in love?

And that's just the beginning! We're continuously creating new and exciting chapters for you to enjoy.

No matter which story you choose, hours of entertainment await!

Download Tabou Stories: Love Episodes now and begin living your secret life!

FOLLOW US:
Instagram: @tabou_game
Facebook: facebook.com/taboustories
descriptionShort: Experience romantic chapters and make spicy choices in your fantasy love story!
